meanings.definition: A drink or snack that revitalizes or renews energy.
meanings.sent1: After a long day of work, I like to enjoy some refreshing refreshers to boost my energy levels.
meanings.sent2: During the break, the hikers stopped to have some delicious refreshers to re-energize themselves.
meanings.sent3: The marathon runners were delighted to find a stand offering free refreshers to help them finish the race.
meanings.sent4: The fresh fruit smoothies served as the perfect refreshers for the tired travelers on their journey.
meanings.sent5: The icy cold lemonade acted as a much-needed refresher on the scorching summer day.

meanings.definition: A brief reminder or review of previously learned information.
meanings.sent1: Before the exam, the teacher gave the students some quick refreshers on the key concepts.
meanings.sent2: The refresher course helped the employees brush up on their skills before starting the new project.
meanings.sent3: The pop quiz served as an unexpected refresher for the students who had forgotten about the upcoming test.
meanings.sent4: The review session acted as a mental refresher for the students before the final exam.
meanings.sent5: The flashcards were a helpful refresher for the students preparing for the vocabulary test.
